title: Stranger Things’ David Harbour is actually ripped and fans are thirsty for it
text:
David Harbour should be arrested after hiding some serious guns underneath Jim Hopper’s detective uniform on Stranger Things.

The actor appeared on Saturday Night Live this weekend but his appearance sent pulses racing when he revealed that he had some serious muscles.

As a result, fans became thirsty overnight with absolutely no shame at all.

The actor joined in regular SNL stars including Kate McKinnon and Cecily Strong to mock gym craze SoulCycle and their over-eager motivational instructors.

For the bit, David was turned into Deacon – a long haired gym instructor ‘addicted to pushing myself…and cocaine’.

His character then went off on a rant about almost making it into the JLo movie Hustlers but never getting the callback he was expecting.

David’s SoulCycle obsessed coke head left viewers wanting more (Picture: NBC)

Viewers couldn’t believe David had been hiding some serious guns underneath Hopper’s uniform (Picture: NBC)

After failing as an actor, he decided that becoming a SoulCycle instructor was easier for him in the long run.

But most of that went over the viewers head as his black tank top revealed that he was seriously hench – and they couldn’t get over his muscly arms.

(Hey, this was the guy that played Hellboy after all…even though most people opt to forget that movie.)

Viewers were so stunned they had to share their new wisdom (and thirst) on Twitter

Gagging on @DavidKHarbour' s arms last night on @nbcsnl. "Dude went from totally geek to totally chic." JK, he even rocks the "dad bod." #SoulCycle#DavidHarbour #SNL — Rebel Queen 👑 (@JuanaLaLoca777) October 13, 2019

Um… excuse me… I'm just gonna collapse in a corner bc of David Harbours f**king arms! #SNL pic.twitter.com/vKI68dctd3 — David S Pumpkins 🧡🎃💀 (@LozzimusPrime) October 13, 2019

Still coming to terms with David Harbour’s arms… Oh my!!! ❤️❤️❤️#SNL — Lara Bridges (@larabridges) October 13, 2019

David’s appearance on the long-running comedy show comes as viewers wait patiently to find out the fate of his character Jim Hopper in Stranger Things.

SNL definitely made the most of their guest star, turning him into an old lady for one sketch, and having him send up Joker with a Sesame Street-inspired parody Grouch in the process.

In the hilariously dark skit parodying the trailer to Todd Phillips’ Joker, Sesame Street’s favourite bin-dwelling puppet is given a complex backstory detailing his journey from normal man to the Grouch he is on the show.

After the show, David was seen out with new girlfriend Lily Allen, confirming the long-held rumour that they were in a relationship.

The couple sighting comes about after Lily and David took a London Tube ride together to see the Vasily Lomachenko v Luke Campbell fight at the O2 last month.

Stranger Things is available now on Netflix.
